TASK: Craft an item of type: warped_door
inventory=[{"type": "cyan_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 47, "index": 17}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 26}, {"type": "orange_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 51, "index": 27}, {"type": "snow", "quantity": 55, "index": 28}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 21, "index": 35}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral_block", "quantity": 20, "index": 40}, {"type": "acacia_fence", "quantity": 52, "index": 44}, {"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 35, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a warped door, I need to place 6 warped planks in a 2x3 grid in the crafting table. Therefore, I will first move 1 warped plank from slot 26 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1
